modName: Quest Eraser -- Remove Quest Objectives from Your Journal
summary:
UPDATE: You can now pick and choose which quest objectives to remove from your journal.
Removes various quest objectives from your journal. Designed for use with The Choice Is Yours.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured_500.png[/img][/url][/center]

[size=4][color=yellow][b]UPDATE: You can now pick and choose which quest objectives to remove from your journal.[/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]This mod will remove various quest objectives from your journal. [/size]

[size=2]This mod does NOT delete the actual quests from the game. You can still choose to complete the quests even after you've removed the objectives from your journal.[/size]

[size=3][color=orange]This mod was designed primarily for use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26359]The Choice Is Yours[/url] in order to remove quest objectives that may already be present in your journal prior to installing The Choice is Yours. However, this mod can be used alone if desired. [/color][/size]

The activator is located inside the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. Look for the ledger book underneath the stairs.

When activated, certain quest objectives will be removed from your journal. You are given the option to remove all of the qualifying quest objectives or to remove only some of them. Even if you choose "ALL," the Quest Eraser will only remove specific quest objectives, not every single quest in your journal. If you choose "SOME," then you will see a series of message boxes asking you whether your would like to remove specific quest objectives from your journal.

This mod does not prevent you from getting quest objectives. It simply removes them after they have appeared in your journal. Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26359]The Choice Is Yours[/url] if you wish to prevent rumors and gossip from automatically triggering quests.

Once again, you can still complete any of these quests even after you've removed the objectives from your journal.

[line]
[size=5][b][center]WANT TO HELP?[/center][/b][/size][b][size=4]
I really don't have time to continue updating this mod. If someone would like to develop it further, you have my permission to do so. All I ask is that I be informed if an updated or modified version is made available. If you would like to help but aren't certain how to edit the scripts, just let me know. This is a fairly simple mod, and I would like to see it continue to be expanded and updated, and while I'd be happy to assist, I just don't have the time to do it all myself.[/size][/b]
[line]


[b][u][size=3]The quest objectives removed by this mod are:[/size][/u][/b]
[spoiler][list][*]Talk to Aventus Aretino
[*]Join the Stormcloak Rebellion
[*]Join the Imperial Legion
[*]Investigate the Bards College
[*]Visit the College of Winterhold
[*]Speak with the leader of the Companions
[*]Visit the Shrine of Azura
[*]Speak to Sinding
[*]Ask about Balgruuf's strange children
[*]Go to the Shrine of Talos
[*]Talk to Danica about the Gildergreen being destroyed
[*]Speak to Lod
[*]Talk with Barbas
[*]Investigate the man wandering the streets near the Bards College
[*]Investigate the Boethiah cultist
[*]Find the shrine of Boethiah
[*]Find the cult of Boethiah
[*]Visit the museum in Dawnstar
[*]Speak to Silus inside his house
[*]Speak to the witchhunter about the abandoned house
[*]Speak to Verulus about the Hall of the Dead
[*]Speak to Degaine
[*]Find Kesh at the Peryite Shrine
[*]Participate in a drinking contest with Sam Guenvere
[*]Speak to Falion
[/list][/spoiler]
Included in Version 1.1:
[spoiler][list][*]Find the Redguard woman
[*]Identify Riften's skooma dealer
[*]Listen to Jaree-Ra's offer in Solitude
[*]Head to the Solitude Court
[*]Visit -----, your new home
[/list][/spoiler]
[b][size=3]In addition to the objectives listed above, the DAWNGUARD version of this mod also removes...[/size][/b]
[spoiler][list][*]Speak with the leader of the Dawnguard
[*]Locate the face sculptor in Riften
[*]Talk to the face sculptor in the Ragged Flagon
[/list][/spoiler]
[line]

[center][b][size=3][color=#c1b868]ALSO CHECK OUT MY OTHER MODS...[/color][/size][/b][/center][b]

files.name: V1_1 Quest Eraser
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to parallel changes made by The Choice is Yours, version 1.1
Also erases the "Visit your new home" quest objectives
